# Add Mermaid User Flow Diagram

Update the README.md to include a user flow diagram using Mermaid syntax.

## Requirements
- Create a flowchart showing the complete user journey
- Include these stages: Customer Actions, Cart, Checkout, Server Processing, Confirmation
- Use emoji icons for visual appeal
- Add color-coded subgraphs for each stage
- Include a summary table with components and key actions

## Example prompt
"Can you update my readme to include a pizza order user flow mermaid diagram?"
